## Checklist for reviewers

- [ ] Code builds and tests pass locally
- [ ] CI checks configured (tests, lint) are green
- [ ] DBT seeds/migrations reviewed (if any)
- [ ] Documentation updated (docs/detections_joining.md, README)
- [ ] Data model impact assessed and communicated

## Branch protection (recommended)

- Protect `main` / `final` / `develop` branches and require:
  - At least one approving review
  - Passing CI checks
  - Enforce linear history (optional)
